com.alexgilleran.icesoap.request

Interface SOAPRequester

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheSOAPRequester, HUCSOAPRequester

    public interface SOAPRequester
    Handles SOAP requests
    Author:
    Alex Gilleran

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response doSoapRequest(SOAPEnvelope envelope, String targetUrl)
      Performs a SOAP request.
      Response doSoapRequest(SOAPEnvelope envelope, String targetUrl, String soapAction)
      Performs a SOAP request.
      void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
      Set the timeout for making connections to the server.
      void setSocketTimeout(int timeout)
      Set the timeout for receiving data from the server - note that this takes into account time to establish a connection, send the envelope, wait for the server to process and then receive it.

    • Method Detail

      • doSoapRequest

        Response doSoapRequest(SOAPEnvelope envelope,
                     String targetUrl)
                       throws IOException
        Performs a SOAP request.
        Parameters:
        envelope - The SOAP envelope to send
        targetUrl - The url of the SOAP web service to communicate with.
        Returns:
        An InputStream representing the
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception occurs while performing the request

      • doSoapRequest

        Response doSoapRequest(SOAPEnvelope envelope,
                     String targetUrl,
                     String soapAction)
                       throws IOException
        Performs a SOAP request.
        Parameters:
        envelope - The SOAP envelope to send
        targetUrl - The url of the SOAP web service to communicate with.
        soapAction - The SOAP Action to perform - this is put in the SOAPAction field of the outgoing HTTP post.
        Returns:
        An InputStream representing the
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception occurs while performing the request

      • setConnectionTimeout

        void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the timeout for making connections to the server.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.

      • setSocketTimeout

        void setSocketTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the timeout for receiving data from the server - note that this takes into account time to establish a connection, send the envelope, wait for the server to process and then receive it.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.
